scripts.dev: concurrently -k "vite --config renderer/vite.config.ts --port 5174" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5174 && env -u ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE ELECTRON_START_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5174 electron electron/main.js"
